column1: Flamengo wins the classic against Fluminense with a late goal.
Palmeiras beats São Paulo 2-1 in a tough match.
Real Madrid secures La Liga title with a solid performance.
Fluminense loses to Flamengo in the final minutes.
Barcelona and Atlético draw 1-1 in a tight game.
São Paulo falls to Palmeiras after leading the game.
Manchester City dominates the derby and beats Manchester United.
Liverpool wins with a comeback against Chelsea.
Chelsea suffers a tough defeat to Liverpool at Anfield.
Atlético holds Barcelona to a draw in Madrid.
